DIY : PID For Line Following
Posted: Sep 13, 2011 #The Do It Yourself Series

At slower speeds, line following is pretty simple - if the sensors say it is going left, steer right and if going right, steer left. This process has its limitations though, mainly when the speed is increased. This is when a PID controller starts to shine. **PID** stands for** Proportional, Integral and Derivative**.
